summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Premium Analytics Dashboard feature. All 33 backend API tests passed (100%). Frontend UI testing confirmed: Premium user sees full dashboard with all metrics, Pro/Free users see upgrade prompt with PREMIUM badge. Date range selector works (7d, 30d, 90d, 1y, all). Export buttons (JSON/CSV) are functional.
passed_tests: GET /api/creators/me/premium-analytics requires authentication
GET /api/creators/me/premium-analytics returns 403 for Free user with upgrade URL
GET /api/creators/me/premium-analytics returns 403 for Pro user (Premium required)
GET /api/creators/me/premium-analytics returns 200 for Premium user
Premium analytics includes analytics_tier='premium' and date_range
Premium analytics includes summary section (total_proposals, approval_rate, completed_projects, engagement_score, predicted_success)
Premium analytics includes comparative_analytics (your_approval_rate, platform_approval_rate, percentile_rank)
Premium analytics includes revenue_tracking (total_estimated_value, realized_value, pipeline_value, pending_value, realization_rate)
Premium analytics includes predictive_insights (success_score, score_label, success_factors, risk_factors, recommendation)
Premium analytics includes arris_analytics (total_interactions, success_rate, processing_times, category_breakdown)
Premium analytics includes trends data with granularity (daily/weekly)
Premium analytics includes platform_performance breakdown
Premium analytics includes growth_metrics (current_month, last_month, mom_growth_percent, growth_trend)
Premium analytics includes engagement section (score, factors, label)
Premium analytics indicates export_available=true with csv/json formats
Default date_range is 30d
7d date_range works with daily granularity
30d date_range works with daily granularity
90d date_range works with weekly granularity
1y date_range works with weekly granularity
all date_range works
GET /api/creators/me/premium-analytics/export requires authentication
GET /api/creators/me/premium-analytics/export returns 403 for Pro user
JSON export returns format='json', data array, filename, record_count, exported_at
CSV export returns format='csv', data string with headers, filename, record_count
Export respects date_range parameter
Default export format is JSON
Free user has advanced_analytics=false in feature-access
Pro user has advanced_analytics=false in feature-access
Premium user has advanced_analytics=true in feature-access
Premium user has tier='premium' in feature-access
Premium user data is consistent across sections
Frontend: Pro user sees PREMIUM badge on Premium Insights tab
Frontend: Pro user sees upgrade prompt with feature highlights
Frontend: Pro user sees 'Upgrade to Premium' button
Frontend: Premium user sees full dashboard with all sections
Frontend: Premium user sees Comparative Analytics section
Frontend: Premium user sees Predictive Insights section
Frontend: Premium user sees Revenue & Value Tracking section
Frontend: Premium user sees ARRIS Deep Analytics section
Frontend: Premium user sees Platform Performance section
Frontend: Premium user sees Growth Metrics section
Frontend: Premium user sees Engagement Score section
Frontend: Premium user sees Export Reports section with JSON/CSV buttons
Frontend: Date range selector works (changed from 30d to 7d)
Frontend: Data refreshes when date range changes
seed_data_creation: Premium test creator (premium@speedtest.com) has Premium subscription with advanced_analytics=true. Has 4 proposals for testing analytics.

premium_analytics_endpoint.free_tier: 403 with feature_gated error and upgrade_url - VERIFIED

export_endpoint.json_format: Returns data array, filename, record_count - VERIFIED
export_endpoint.csv_format: Returns CSV string with headers - VERIFIED

analytics_sections.summary: total_proposals, approval_rate, completed_projects, engagement_score, predicted_success - VERIFIED
analytics_sections.platform_performance: Per-platform breakdown with approval rates - VERIFIED

frontend_ui.pro_user_view: Shows PREMIUM badge on tab, upgrade prompt with feature highlights - VERIFIED
frontend_ui.premium_user_view: Shows full dashboard with all sections - VERIFIED
frontend_ui.export_buttons: JSON and CSV buttons visible and clickable - VERIFIED

mocked_apis.revenue_estimates: Based on complexity (Low=$500, Medium=$1500, High=$3500, Very High=$7500) - MOCKED

context_for_next_testing_agent: Premium Analytics feature fully implemented and tested. Only Premium/Elite users (advanced_analytics=true) can access GET /api/creators/me/premium-analytics. Pro/Free users get 403 with upgrade prompt. Features include: Comparative Analytics (vs platform averages), Revenue Tracking (estimated values), Predictive Insights (AI success prediction), ARRIS Analytics (processing times), Platform Performance, Growth Metrics, Engagement Score, and Export (JSON/CSV). Date range parameter supports 7d, 30d, 90d, 1y, all. Test credentials: premium@speedtest.com (Premium tier), protest@dashboard.com (Pro tier).
